title: The Man in the mirror
creator_credit: BNA Communications and Amram Nowak Associates
brief_description: Using “Bert” a typical surburban dad/husband/managing executive, to show the mid-life crisis in home and especially at work. “Phil” a young executive has new innovative plans for the company but Bert is too threatened to pass on Phil’s ideas. Phil resigns and Bert gets questioned about it by his superior. The film is based on books written by Joe Batten.
